channel.title: E. Pagnin, C. Brunetta, P. Picazo-Sanchez on Elena Pagnin
channel.description: Recent content in E. Pagnin, C. Brunetta, P. Picazo-Sanchez on Elena Pagnin

item.title: HIKE: Walking the Privacy Trail
item.description: We consider the problem of privacy-preserving processing of outsourced data in the context of user-customised services. Clients store their data on a server. In order to provide user-dependent services, service providers may ask the server to compute functions on the users’ data. We propose a new solution to this problem that guarantees data privacy (i.e., an honest-but-curious server cannot access plaintexts), as well as that service providers can correctly decrypt only –functions on– the data the user gave them access to (i.
